name: Kustom Live Wallpaper
summary: A KLWP file is a live wallpaper created by KLWP Live Wallpaper Maker, a wallpaper creation app for Android . The wallpaper may contain images, animations, widgets, text, and effects. You can use KLWP Live Wallpaper Maker to set a KLWP file as your Android wallpaper.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

android.display_name: Kustom Industries KLWP Live Wallpaper Maker

windows.display_name: Kustom Industries KLWP Live Wallpaper Maker
